sous_titre_activite: The values favored by NATIONAL CASH constitute essential points of reference and instruments of mobilization for all staff.
description_nc: National Cash (NC), is a Mauritan microfinance limited company approved by the Central Bank of Mauritania BCM. Created in February 2018, leader in the microfinance sector in Mauritania, NC aims to promote economic and social inclusion vulnerable populations (especially women, young people and rural populations) and to contribute to the economic development of the country. It works in particular for the promotion of entrepreneurship and thus contributes to the national effort to promote the self-employment of young people and women in disadvantaged neighborhoods and rural areas.

cc_partie1: Mandatory basic product for any customer. It is used as a support for the operations of payment, withdrawal, transfer, direct debit and payment, cashing of checks, repayment of loans and direct debits of receipts.
cc_partie2: Unlimited payments and withdrawals;. Opening: 500 MRU for natural persons and 1,000 MRU for legal persons; Monthly account maintenance fee of 20 MRU for natural persons and 50 MRU for legal persons.
depot_terme1: This Product is remunerated at a rate agreed between the customer and National Cash who are committed in agreed partnership terms.
depot_terme2: Amount remains blocked in the account until the expiry of the contract. Minimum amount: 50,000 MRU. Margin: Advantageous and negotiable rate. Possibility of withdrawals in case of urgent need
plan_epargne1: This Product is remunerated at a rate agreed between the customer and National Cash who are committed in agreed partnership terms.
plan_epargne2: Monthly payments of a constant amount; . Over a period set out in the PEP (Project Savings Plan) contract; . Margin: Advantageous and negotiable rate; . Possibility of withdrawals in case of urgent need; Possibility of benefiting from a loan of a higher amount of 1 to 5 times the amount saved over an equivalent period to finance project, object of the PEP.
description1_mewelny: Loan granted individually to micro entrepreneurs to strengthen their working capital, acquire machines, tools and work equipment with at least one year of experience in the project, with fairly structured activities and desiring higher amounts.
description2_mewelny: Target: Micro and Small Entrepreneurs, Traders; Amount: 10,000 to 100,000 MRU. Duration: up to 12 months Have guarantees (jewelry pledge, equipment pledge, mortgage, occupancy permit, badge, deposit or endorsement)
description1_noujoune: Crédit Noujoume: Loan granted individually to micro entrepreneurs who have successfully completed at least two credit cycles, without incident (no delay in repayment to strengthen their working capital, acquire machinery, tools and work equipment) one year of experience in the project, with fairly structured activities and desiring higher amounts.
description2_noujoune: Target: Micro and Small Entrepreneurs, Traders;Amount: 100,000 to 300,000 MRU.Duration: up to 12 months (exceptionally 18 months in case of investment) Have guarantees (jewelry pledge, equipment pledge, mortgage, occupancy permit, badge, deposit or endorsement)
description1_beyti: Loan granted individually to micro entrepreneurs to strengthen their working capital, acquire machines, tools and work equipment with at least one year of experience in the project, with fairly structured activities and desiring higher amounts
description2_beyti: Target: Micro and Small Entrepreneurs, Traders; Amount: 10,000 to 100,000 MRU. Duration: up to 12 months Have guarantees (jewelry pledge, equipment pledge, mortgage, occupancy permit, badge, deposit or endorsement)
description1_takaful: Takaful Credit: Loan intended for groups of solidarity micro-entrepreneurs, consisting of 2 to 5 entrepreneurs, and wishing to develop an income-generating activity, with scalable amounts ranging between 5,000 MRO and 10,000 MRO, for each member of the group, and a repayment period of 6 to 12 months. It is characterized by the mutual aid and mutuality of the members composing the group who undertakes to act as guarantor for the repayment of their loan.
description2_takaful: Target: Micro and Small Entrepreneurs, Traders, Amount: 5,000 to 10,000 MRU per person.Duration: 6 to 12 months Guarantee: Joint and several guarantee, endorsement;Security deposit of 20% of the amount requested
description1_bidaya: Credit Bidaya: Product intended for young micro-entrepreneurs with a project idea and with the skills to carry it out.
description2_bidaya: Target: Micro and Small Entrepreneurs, Traders, Amount: 10,000 to 100,000 MRU.Duration: 12 to 24 months Have guarantees (jewelry pledge, equipment pledge, mortgage, permit to occupy, badge, deposit or endorsement);Security deposit of 30% of the amount requested Domiciliation of revenue
description1_equipement: Samsung Equipment Credit: Credit on credit solution, allowing you to immediately enjoy your Samsung equipment without having to pay for your entire device at once.
description2_equipement: Target: Micro and Small Entrepreneurs, Traders, employees Amount: 5,000 to 150,000 MRU Duration: 3 to 12 months Domiciliation salary; Domiciliation revenues; Guarantee: (material guarantees, endorsement, deposit)Security deposit of 40% of the amount requested if no direct debit
description1_avance_salaire: Salary Advance Credit: Intended for residents of the institution who can benefit from three months' salary payable over 6 to 12 months
description2_avance_salaire: Cible : salariés Montant : 03 mois de salaire Durée: 6 à 12 mois Domiciliation salaire ;
